subject: RE: Backend Update - Already Done!
body:
Good news Chord! The barbershop organizer types are ALREADY in calendar-be.

Commit: 9c8799d feat: Add app-specific organizer types for multi-app support

The model (models/organizers.js lines 128-136) already includes:
- isChorus
- isQuartet
- isChorusCoach
- isQuartetCoach
- isJudge
- isVocalTeacher
- isRegionalAdmin

This is on DEVL branch and pushed to origin. No additional commits needed.

Your frontend changes in harmonyjunction.org should work with the existing backend.

Let me know if you need anything else for the appId=1/appId=2 coordination!
